query: SELECT cost_centre.name AS cost_centre_name, invoice_item.vat AS vat, SUM(invoice_item.amount * invoice_item.net_price_single) AS sum_net, SUM(CASE WHEN invoice_item.vat_exempt THEN (invoice_item.amount * "net_price_single") else 0 END) as sum_vat_exempted FROM cost_centre JOIN invoice_item ON cost_centre.id=invoice_item.cost_centre_id GROUP BY cost_centre_name, vat ORDER BY cost_centre_name, vat;
